oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bacon revolver and original holster
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Bacon Manufacturing Company made several models of .31 caliber pocket revolvers from 1858-1867 with around 1,400 pistols produced. Bacon also produced the same pistols marked with the names of other firms.; The black leather holster is typical Civil War era construction and is probably original to the pistol.
